sqlMap.select:
SELECT u.first_name,u.last_name,
i.income_date as publish_date,
i.income_pull_date as publish_date,
sum(p.money_pull) as totalMoney, 0 as putonMoney FROM tb_income_pull p left outer join tb_income i on p.income_id = i.income_id left outer join tb_sys_user u on i.user_id = u.id left outer join tb_ad_resource_carrier rc on p.ad_resource_carrier_id = rc.ad_resource_carrier_id
(i.income_date >= #startDate#)
(i.income_date <= #endDate#)
(i.income_pull_date >= #startDate#)
(i.income_pull_date <= #endDate#)
p.ad_resource_carrier_id = #carrierIdList[]#
i.user_id = #UserIdList[]#
group by i.user_id,substring(i.income_date,5,2)
group by i.user_id,substring(i.income_pull_date,5,2)

SELECT u.first_name, u.last_name,
i.income_date as publish_date,
i.income_pull_date as publish_date,
sum(p.money_pull) as totalMoney, 0 as putonMoney from tb_income_pull p
left outer join tb_income i on p.income_id = i.income_id
left outer join tb_sys_user u on i.user_id = u.id
left outer join tb_sys_user u on p.create_by = u.id
left outer join tb_ad_resource_carrier rc on p.ad_resource_carrier_id = rc.ad_resource_carrier_id
p.version = #yearIdList[]#
(i.income_date >= #startDate#)
(i.income_date <= #endDate#)
(i.income_pull_date >= #startDate#)
(i.income_pull_date <= #endDate#)
p.ad_resource_carrier_id = #carrierIdList[]#
i.income_purpose_id = #incomePurposeIdList[]#
i.user_id = #UserIdList[]#
(i.user_id = #UserIdList[]#)
(p.create_by = #UserIdList[]#)
group by i.user_id,substring(i.income_date,5,2)
group by p.create_by,substring(i.income_date,5,2)
group by i.user_id,substring(i.income_pull_date,5,2)
group by p.create_by,substring(i.income_pull_date,5,2)

SELECT sum(p.money_pull) as incomeMoney,rc.ad_resource_carrier_id as carrierId,
rc.alias_name as carrier_name
rc.carrier_name
FROM tb_income_pull p left outer join tb_income i on p.income_id = i.income_id left outer join tb_ad_resource_carrier rc on p.ad_resource_carrier_id = rc.ad_resource_carrier_id
(i.income_date >= #startDate#)
(i.income_date <= #endDate#)
(i.income_pull_date >= #startDate#)
(i.income_pull_date <= #endDate#)
rc.ad_resource_carrier_id = #carrierIdList[]#
i.customer_id = #customerIdList[]#
i.user_id = #UserIdList[]#
p.create_by = #UserIdList[]#
i.income_purpose_id = #incomePurposeIdList[]#
p.version = #yearIdList[]#
group by rc.alias_name
group by rc.ad_resource_carrier_id
order by rc.ad_resource_channel_id

SELECT sum(p.money_pull) as incomeMoney,p.ad_ad_resource_type_id as carrierId, rt.name as carrier_name
FROM tb_income_pull p left outer join tb_income i on p.income_id = i.income_id
left outer join tb_ad_resource_type rt on rt.ad_ad_resource_type_id = p.ad_ad_resource_type_id
(i.income_date >= #startDate#)
(i.income_date <= #endDate#)
(i.income_pull_date >= #startDate#)
(i.income_pull_date <= #endDate#)
i.customer_id = #customerIdList[]#
i.user_id = #UserIdList[]#
p.create_by = #UserIdList[]#
i.income_purpose_id = #incomePurposeIdList[]#
p.version = #yearIdList[]#
group by p.ad_ad_resource_type_id

select tci.customer_name as customerName, sum(pll.money_pull) as incomeMoney from tb_income inc left outer join tb_customer_info tci on tci.customer_id = inc.customer_id
left outer join tb_income_pull pll on pll.income_id = inc.income_id
left outer join tb_ad_resource_info tri on pll.ad_resource_carrier_id=tri.ad_resource_carrier_id
inc.version = #yearIdList[]#
(inc.income_date >= #startDate#)
(inc.income_date <= #endDate#)
inc.user_id = #UserIdList[]#
tri.ad_resource_info_id = #carrierIdList[]#
group by inc.customer_id

select substring(income_date ,5,2) as incomeCode,
select substring(income_pull_date ,5,2) as incomeCode,
pll.ad_resource_carrier_id as resourceCarrierId, sum(pll.money_pull) as incomeMoney from tb_income_pull pll left outer join tb_income inc on pll.income_id = inc.income_id
(inc.version = #targetDateYear#)
substring(inc.income_pull_date,1,4) = #targetDateYear#
pll.ad_resource_carrier_id = #carrierIdList[]#
inc.user_id = #UserIdList[]#
pll.create_by = #UserIdList[]#
pll.version = #yearIdList[]#
inc.income_purpose_id = #incomePurposeIdList[]#
(inc.customer_id = #customerId#)
group by pll.ad_resource_carrier_id,
substring(inc.income_date,5,2)
substring(inc.income_pull_date,5,2)

select tci.customer_name as customerName, sum(pll.money_pull) as incomeMoney from tb_income inc left outer join tb_customer_info tci on tci.customer_id = inc.customer_id left outer join tb_income_pull pll on pll.income_id = inc.income_id
(inc.income_date >= #startDate#)
(inc.income_date <= #endDate#)
(inc.income_pull_date >= #startDate#)
(inc.income_pull_date <= #endDate#)
pll.ad_ad_resource_type_id = #resourceSortIdList[]#
pll.version = #yearIdList[]#
inc.user_id = #UserIdList[]#
pll.create_by = #UserIdList[]#
pll.ad_resource_carrier_id = #carrierIdList[]#
inc.income_purpose_id = #incomePurposeIdList[]#
(tci.customer_id like #customerId#)
tci.customer_id = #customerIdList[]#
group by inc.customer_id

select substring(income_date ,5,2) as incomeCode,
select substring(income_pull_date ,5,2) as incomeCode,
sum(pll.money_pull) as incomeMoney from tb_income inc left outer join tb_income_pull pll on pll.income_id = inc.income_id
pll.version = #yearIdList[]#
(inc.version = #year#)
substring(inc.income_pull_date,1,4) = #year#
inc.user_id = #UserIdList[]#
pll.create_by = #UserIdList[]#
pll.ad_resource_carrier_id = #carrierIdList[]#
pll.ad_ad_resource_type_id = #resourceSortIdList[]#
inc.income_purpose_id = #incomePurposeIdList[]#
inc.customer_id = #CustomerIdList[]#
group by substring(inc.income_date,5,2)
group by substring(inc.income_pull_date,5,2)

select I.customer_id, I.income_id, I.income_code, I.income_date, I.income_money, I.income_pull_date, I.memo, sum(iu.money_in) as money_in,
chanl.name as channel_name,
I.sys_org_id,
MODD.name as incomeModeName, PUR.name as incomePurposeName, CUST.customer_name as customerName, US.first_name as firstName, US.last_name as lastName
from tb_income I
left outer join tb_income_pull pll on pll.income_id = I.income_id
left outer join tb_ad_resource_carrier rc on rc.ad_resource_carrier_id = pll.ad_resource_carrier_id
left outer join tb_ad_resource_channel AS chanl ON chanl.resource_mediaorg_id = rc.ad_resource_channel_id
left outer join tb_income_used iu on iu.income_pull_id = pll.income_pull_id
left outer join tb_income_mode MODD on I.income_mode_id = MODD.income_mode_id
left outer join tb_income_purpose PUR on I.income_purpose_id = PUR.income_purpose_id
left outer join tb_customer_info CUST on I.customer_id = CUST.customer_id
left outer join tb_sys_user US on I.user_id = US.id
group by I.income_id order by substring(I.income_date,1,6) desc,I.income_code desc

select sum(sb.income_money) as incomeMoney,sum(sb.money_in) as incomeUsed
from(select I.income_money as income_money,sum(iu.money_in) as money_in
from tb_income I
left outer join tb_income_pull pll on pll.income_id = I.income_id
left outer join tb_income_used iu on iu.income_pull_id = pll.income_pull_id
left outer join tb_income_mode MODD on I.income_mode_id = MODD.income_mode_id
left outer join tb_income_purpose PUR on I.income_purpose_id = PUR.income_purpose_id
left outer join tb_customer_info CUST on I.customer_id = CUST.customer_id
left outer join tb_sys_user US on I.user_id = US.id
group by I.income_id ) as sb

select count(*) FROM (select count(*) from tb_income I left outer join tb_income_pull pll on pll.income_id = I.income_id left outer join tb_customer_info CUST on I.customer_id = CUST.customer_id
group by I.income_id) AS sb

select count(*) from tb_income
income_id = #IncomeIdList[]#

select I.*, MODD.name as incomeModeName, PUR.name as incomePurposeName, CUST.customer_name as customerName, US.first_name as firstName, US.last_name as lastName from tb_income I left outer join tb_income_mode MODD on I.income_mode_id = MODD.income_mode_id left outer join tb_income_purpose PUR on I.income_purpose_id = PUR.income_purpose_id left outer join tb_customer_info CUST on I.customer_id = CUST.customer_id left outer join tb_sys_user US on I.user_id = US.id where I.income_id = #value#

select I.*, MODD.name as incomeModeName, PUR.name as incomePurposeName, CUST.customer_name as customerName, US.first_name as firstName, US.last_name as lastName from tb_income I left outer join tb_income_mode MODD on I.income_mode_id = MODD.income_mode_id left outer join tb_income_purpose PUR on I.income_purpose_id = PUR.income_purpose_id left outer join tb_customer_info CUST on I.customer_id = CUST.customer_id left outer join tb_sys_user US on I.user_id = US.id where I.income_code = #incomeCode#

select I.*, MODD.name as incomeModeName, PUR.name as incomePurposeName, CUST.customer_name as customerName, US.first_name as firstName, US.last_name as lastName from tb_income I
left outer join tb_income_mode MODD on I.income_mode_id = MODD.income_mode_id left outer join tb_income_purpose PUR on I.income_purpose_id = PUR.income_purpose_id left outer join tb_customer_info CUST on I.customer_id = CUST.customer_id left outer join tb_sys_user US on I.user_id = US.id
where I.income_code = #incomeCode# and CUST.sys_org_id = #orgId# and I.version = #year#
sqlMap.insert:
insert into tb_income (sys_org_id,user_id,create_by,create_date,customer_id,income_code,income_date,income_mode_id,income_money,income_purpose_id,modify_by,modify_date,memo,income_pull_date,version) values ( ?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,? )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id
sqlMap.update: update tb_income set sys_org_id = ?, user_id = ?, memo = ? , customer_id = ?, income_code = ?, income_date = ?, income_mode_id = ?, income_money = ?, income_purpose_id = ?, version = ?, income_pull_date = ?, modify_by = ? where income_id = ?
sqlMap.select: select account_id id,account_no no,bank_name name from tb_sys_bank_account

select I.*, MODD.name as incomeModeName, PUR.name as incomePurposeName, CUST.customer_name as customerName, US.first_name as firstName, US.last_name as lastName from tb_income I
left outer join tb_income_mode MODD on I.income_mode_id = MODD.income_mode_id left outer join tb_income_purpose PUR on I.income_purpose_id = PUR.income_purpose_id left outer join tb_customer_info CUST on I.customer_id = CUST.customer_id left outer join tb_sys_user US on I.user_id = US.id
(CUST.sys_org_id = #orgId#)
(I.version = #year#)
(I.income_code like '%$incomeCode$%')

dynamic.isEqual:
I.customer_id in ( select aaa.customer_id from (
select o.customer_id ,sum(dt.money_realpay)-sum(dt.money_in) as cuikuan,o.user_id from tb_order_detail AS dt Inner Join tb_order AS o ON o.order_id = dt.order_id and dt.money_realpay <> 0 and dt.money_realpay <> dt.money_in
o.version = #yearIdList[]#
group by o.customer_id,o.user_id ) as aaa where aaa.cuikuan >0 AND aaa.user_id = I.user_id AND aaa.customer_id = I.customer_id )

I.customer_id in (
select aaa.customer_id from ( select o.customer_id ,sum(dt.money_realpay)-sum(dt.money_in) as cuikuan,o.user_id from tb_order_detail AS dt Inner Join tb_order AS o ON o.order_id = dt.order_id
o.version = #yearIdList[]#
group by o.customer_id,o.user_id ) as aaa where aaa.cuikuan = 0 AND aaa.user_id = I.user_id AND aaa.customer_id = I.customer_id)

sqlMap.select:
select count(sb.income_id) as id,sum(sb.income_money) as incomeMoney,
sum(sb.money_in) as incomeUsed
from(
select I.income_id,I.customer_id, I.user_id,I.income_money as income_money,
IFNULL(sum(iu.money_in),0) as money_in
from tb_income I
left outer join tb_income_pull pll on pll.income_id = I.income_id
left outer join tb_ad_resource_carrier rc on rc.ad_resource_carrier_id = pll.ad_resource_carrier_id
left outer join tb_ad_resource_channel AS chanl ON chanl.resource_mediaorg_id = rc.ad_resource_channel_id
left outer join tb_income_used iu on iu.income_pull_id = pll.income_pull_id
left outer join tb_income_mode MODD on I.income_mode_id = MODD.income_mode_id
left outer join tb_income_purpose PUR on I.income_purpose_id = PUR.income_purpose_id
left outer join tb_customer_info CUST on I.customer_id = CUST.customer_id
left outer join tb_sys_user US on I.user_id = US.id
group by I.income_id
) as sb

select pll.income_pull_id as income_pull_id, pll.money_pull as money_pull,
pll.ad_ad_resource_type_id as resource_type_id,
rc.carrier_name as carrier_name, pll.ad_resource_carrier_id as carrier_id, chanl.name as channel_name, chanl.resource_mediaorg_id as channel_id,
I.user_id, I.customer_id, I.income_id, I.income_code, I.income_date, I.income_money, I.income_pull_date, I.memo, IFNULL(sum(iu.money_in),0) as money_in,
CUST.sys_org_id,
MODD.name as incomeModeName, PUR.name as incomePurposeName, CUST.customer_name as customerName, US.first_name as firstName, US.last_name as lastName
from tb_income I
left outer join tb_income_pull pll on pll.income_id = I.income_id
left outer join tb_income_used iu on iu.income_pull_id = pll.income_pull_id
inner join tb_income_mode MODD on I.income_mode_id = MODD.income_mode_id
inner join tb_income_purpose PUR on I.income_purpose_id = PUR.income_purpose_id
inner join tb_customer_info CUST on I.customer_id = CUST.customer_id
left outer join tb_sys_user US on I.user_id = US.id
left outer join tb_ad_resource_carrier rc on rc.ad_resource_carrier_id = pll.ad_resource_carrier_id
left outer join tb_ad_resource_channel AS chanl ON chanl.resource_mediaorg_id = rc.ad_resource_channel_id
left outer join tb_ad_resource_type rt on rt.ad_ad_resource_type_id= pll.ad_ad_resource_type_id
group by I.income_id
order by I.income_code desc

select
chanl.name as channel_name, 0 as income_date,rsort.name as resource_sort_name,
cip.name as channel_name, 0 as income_date,rsort.name as resource_sort_name,
substring(odi.publish_date,1,4) as channel_name, 0 as income_date,'' as resource_sort_name,
chanl.name as channel_name, substring(odi.publish_date,1,4) as income_date,rsort.name as resource_sort_name,
cip.name as channel_name, substring(odi.publish_date,1,4) as income_date,rsort.name as resource_sort_name,
substring(odi.publish_date,1,4) as channel_name, 0 as income_date,substring(odi.publish_date,5,2) as resource_sort_name,
chanl.resource_mediaorg_id as channel_id,
IFNULL(sum(I.income_money),0) as income_money IFNULL(sum(iu.money_in),0) as money_in
from tb_income I
left outer join tb_income_pull pll on pll.income_id = I.income_id left outer join tb_income_used iu on iu.income_pull_id = pll.income_pull_id Inner Join tb_order_day_info AS odi on iu.order_day_info_id = odi.order_day_info_id Inner Join tb_order_detail AS dt ON dt.order_detail_id = odi.order_detail_id Inner Join tb_adver_matter as mt on mt.adver_matter_id = dt.adver_matter_id Inner Join tb_customer_industry_type ci on mt.adver_product_brand_id = ci.customer_industry_type_id Inner Join tb_customer_industry_type cip on cip.customer_industry_type_id = ci.parent_id Inner Join tb_ad_resource_info AS rs ON rs.ad_resource_info_id = dt.ad_resource_info_id Inner Join tb_ad_resource_sort AS rsort ON rsort.ad_resource_sort_id = rs.ad_resource_sort_id inner join tb_income_mode MODD on I.income_mode_id = MODD.income_mode_id inner join tb_income_purpose PUR on I.income_purpose_id = PUR.income_purpose_id inner join tb_customer_info CUST on I.customer_id = CUST.customer_id left outer join tb_sys_user US on I.user_id = US.id left outer join tb_ad_resource_carrier rc on rc.ad_resource_carrier_id = rs.ad_resource_carrier_id left outer join tb_ad_resource_channel AS chanl ON chanl.resource_mediaorg_id = rc.ad_resource_channel_id
group by chanl.resource_mediaorg_id,rsort.ad_resource_sort_id
group by cip.customer_industry_type_id,rsort.ad_resource_sort_id
group by substring(odi.publish_date,1,4)
group by substring(odi.publish_date,1,4),chanl.resource_mediaorg_id,rsort.ad_resource_sort_id
group by substring(odi.publish_date,1,4),cip.customer_industry_type_id,rsort.ad_resource_sort_id
group by substring(odi.publish_date,1,4),substring(odi.publish_date,5,2)
order by chanl.resource_mediaorg_id,rsort.ad_resource_sort_id
order by cip.customer_industry_type_id,rsort.ad_resource_sort_id
order by substring(odi.publish_date,1,4)
order by substring(odi.publish_date,1,4), chanl.resource_mediaorg_id,rsort.ad_resource_sort_id
order by substring(odi.publish_date,1,4), cip.customer_industry_type_id,rsort.ad_resource_sort_id
order by substring(odi.publish_date,1,4),substring(odi.publish_date,5,6)

select
chanl.name as channel_name, 0 as income_date,rsort.name as resource_sort_name,
cip.name as channel_name, 0 as income_date,rsort.name as resource_sort_name,
substring(odi.publish_date,1,4) as channel_name, 0 as income_date,'' as resource_sort_name,
chanl.name as channel_name, substring(odi.publish_date,1,4) as income_date,rsort.name as resource_sort_name,
cip.name as channel_name, substring(odi.publish_date,1,4) as income_date,rsort.name as resource_sort_name,
substring(odi.publish_date,1,4) as channel_name, 0 as income_date,substring(odi.publish_date,5,2) as resource_sort_name,
chanl.resource_mediaorg_id as channel_id, I.income_money, IFNULL(sum(iu.money_in),0) as money_in
from tb_income I
left outer join tb_income_pull pll on pll.income_id = I.income_id left outer join tb_income_used iu on iu.income_pull_id = pll.income_pull_id Inner Join tb_order_day_info AS odi on iu.order_day_info_id = odi.order_day_info_id Inner Join tb_order_detail AS dt ON dt.order_detail_id = odi.order_detail_id Inner Join tb_adver_matter as mt on mt.adver_matter_id = dt.adver_matter_id Inner Join tb_customer_industry_type ci on mt.adver_product_brand_id = ci.customer_industry_type_id Inner Join tb_customer_industry_type cip on cip.customer_industry_type_id = ci.parent_id Inner Join tb_ad_resource_info AS rs ON rs.ad_resource_info_id = dt.ad_resource_info_id Inner Join tb_ad_resource_sort AS rsort ON rsort.ad_resource_sort_id = rs.ad_resource_sort_id inner join tb_income_mode MODD on I.income_mode_id = MODD.income_mode_id inner join tb_income_purpose PUR on I.income_purpose_id = PUR.income_purpose_id inner join tb_customer_info CUST on I.customer_id = CUST.customer_id left outer join tb_sys_user US on I.user_id = US.id left outer join tb_ad_resource_carrier rc on rc.ad_resource_carrier_id = rs.ad_resource_carrier_id left outer join tb_ad_resource_channel AS chanl ON chanl.resource_mediaorg_id = rc.ad_resource_channel_id
pll.income_pull_id = #incomePullIdList[]#
group by chanl.resource_mediaorg_id,rsort.ad_resource_sort_id
group by cip.customer_industry_type_id,rsort.ad_resource_sort_id
group by substring(odi.publish_date,1,4)
group by substring(odi.publish_date,1,4),chanl.resource_mediaorg_id,rsort.ad_resource_sort_id
group by substring(odi.publish_date,1,4),cip.customer_industry_type_id,rsort.ad_resource_sort_id
group by substring(odi.publish_date,1,4),substring(odi.publish_date,5,2)
order by chanl.resource_mediaorg_id,rsort.ad_resource_sort_id
order by cip.customer_industry_type_id,rsort.ad_resource_sort_id
order by substring(odi.publish_date,1,4)
order by substring(odi.publish_date,1,4), chanl.resource_mediaorg_id,rsort.ad_resource_sort_id
order by substring(odi.publish_date,1,4), cip.customer_industry_type_id,rsort.ad_resource_sort_id
order by substring(odi.publish_date,1,4),substring(odi.publish_date,5,6)

select IFNULL(sum(I.income_money),0) as income_money
from tb_income I
left outer join tb_income_pull pll on pll.income_id = I.income_id
pll.income_pull_id = #incomePullIdList[]#
